#!/usr/bin/env python3

N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0

for i in range(N):
    for j in range(i + 1, N - 1):
        count += A[i] * A[j]

print(count % (10 ** 9 + 7))

ans = 0

A = list(map(int, input().split()))

        count += A[i] * A[j]

print(count % (10 ** 9 + 7))  # 10 ** 9 + 7 は 10 ** 9 + 7 と表記する

# coding: utf-8
N = int(input())  # 入力
A = list(map(int, input().split()))  # 入力
count = 0  # 初期化
for i in range(N - 1):  # ループ
    for j in range(i + 1, N):  # ループ
        count += A[i] * A[j]  # 計算
print(count % (10 ** 9 + 7))  # 出力

N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))

count = 0

for i in range(N - 1):
    for j in range(i + 1, N):
        if A[i] > A[j]:
            count += 1

print(count % (10 ** 9 + 7))
